content.raw:
@swhart115

~~~
So is the issue that I pulled an update this morning that fails on not finding the world file, rather then just proceeding without one?
~~~

I think the issues here might be:

  - something you pulled this morning caused the world file to not be found. Can you double check if this is an error caused by changes in gazebo?
  - when gazebo world is not found on simulation startup, the boost mutex error on shutdown is not nice and is confusing.
content.html:
@swhart115

So is the issue that I pulled an update this morning that fails on not finding the world file, rather then just proceeding without one?

I think the issues here might be:

  • something you pulled this morning caused the world file to not be found. Can you double check if this is an error caused by changes in gazebo?
  • when gazebo world is not found on simulation startup, the boost mutex error on shutdown is not nice and is confusing.
